data: Some few years ago, in the month of September, I happened to be kicking my heels in Paris, awaiting the arrival there of my friend Hugo Kennett.
Capes, Bernard, 1854-1918; Chesterton, G. K. (Gilbert Keith), 1874-1936 [Author of introduction, etc.]
